name: Greater Balor Whip
text: You can pull in foes with your whip and then attack them with your sword.
prerequisites: Balor Whip, Improved Balor Whip, Weapon Focus (whip), Whip Mastery, base attack bonus +16.
benefit: When you use Improved Balor Whip to make a single attack at your highest attack bonus, your critical threat range increases to 19â€“20 and you gain a +4 bonus on critical confirmation rolls if you threaten a critical hit with that attack.
